channel.title: undefined - Dietrich Ayala
channel.description: Internet freedom, the web and Mozilla.

item.title: Counterpane's Password Manager (via The .NET Guy)
item.description: "Here's the coolest free program you're probably not using: Password Safe. It's brought to you by security guru Bruce Schneier, author of Applied Cryptography. I've been using this for about 3 years now, and it's super. People occasionally ask me what a good program is for managing passwords, and everybody walks away happy with a copy of this super utility. Enjoy!"Link
item.dc:creator: Dietrich Ayala
